name: Lash Adhesive
about: What it is:.What it does:.What else you need to know:
ingredients: Acrylates/Ethylhexl, Acrylate Copolymer, Water, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.. How to Apply: ...-1. Prep and measure: Gently remove lashes from tray, measure lash to fit the length of your eyelid. ..-2. Trim to size: Trim the lash band just shy of your natural eye length. Trim from the outer corner to maintain the style. ..-3. Apply Velour Lash Adhesive: Brush a thin layer to the band, allowing glue to become tacky before application...-4. Apply Lashes: Using Velour’s Too Easy Lash Applicator, grasp and place the lash as close to your natural lash line as possible. Then adjust the corners.....How to Care: ..-1. Avoid mascara: Never apply mascara directly to your Velour Lashes as this can damage the hairs. If needed, apply to your natural lashes only. ..-2. Remove glue: Once there is a small buildup of lash glue on the band, gently peel off using Velour’s Too Easy Lash Applicator or your fingers. ..-3. Store: Never soak your lashes in water or makeup remover. Store away from moisture and dust. ..-4. Be gentle: Always hold your lashes from the band, not the hairs, whether removing from packaging or your eyes. ..-5. Spot clean: Clean any makeup that gets on your lashes with oil-free makeup remover, using a Q-tip, dab and twirl as needed on affected areas. ..-6. Keep the curl: If your lashes get wet and loose curl, you can use an eyelash curler to reshape.

reviews.review_title: Put extra on the ends or Directly to lash line
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As an individual with sensitive eyes, I was happy to try this. I applied the glue once across the lash band, then added a dab more on the ends to ensure a secure hold. The glue has a light white milky look when it goes on and dries down to a clear-ish-matte texture  (approximately 30 seconds later). It did not irritate my eye upon application nor during the first 30 minutes of wear. Unfortunately, after 4 hours the lash ends began to rise up, I assume due to my oily eyelids. On my second attempt testing the glue, I used a hack I found on social media and applied the glue directly to my lash line. The glue got tacky quickly and the lashes held on more securely and did not have raised edges after 6 hours of wear. To remove I used an oil-based eye makeup remover to ensure it breaks the glue down and does not leave any behind. Though I prefer the Velour's 3-in-1 Lash Liner, this is also a great alternative for those no-makeup-makeup days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A superior lash glue- better than any I have tried up to this point. Latex free is a game changer if you have sensitive eyes or skin. The adhesion lasted through a very hot evening, and even when taking the lashes off, they were well secured. My only piece of advice is to make sure you get all of the glue off of your lash line when removing as I had residue in my lashes for a day or two.

reviews.review_text: Easy to apply and remove! A little goes a long way

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I swear by this lash adhesive. Of note, I only use Velour’s lashes in their collection. I have been wearing falsies regularly for over 12 years and this stuff I trust. The drugstore “D” brand that is quite famous used to irritate my very sensitive eyes, and I would usually need prescription drops if excessive sweating or wearing them for too long resulted in an infection. Velour’s adhesive is tacky without being heavy, makes the application easier, and is much easier to remove safely from the lash band. For some reason the black didn’t work for me—too messy and did not feel as strong—but I am the Velour white adhesive’s number one fan

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great lash glue. Cute and minimal packaging, easy to take on the go and reapply if my lashes feel like coming off (looking at you inner corner). Will need to try the black colour next!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Don’t even waste your time with cheap drug store adhesive ! Velour is the best ! Fine tip applicator and precise adherence and easy to remove

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has taken me a long time to find a lash adhesive that doesn’t get too messy but applies easily - but this is now my holy grail! It doesn’t sting my eyes as I’ve noticed using some adhesive do and this lash adhesive doesn’t need to be applied multiple times as it stays all day or night!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed this product because of it dries down to a clear formula that won’t mess up your eye makeup! I will say it took some time to apply because of how wet the formula is, but once you get the hang of it it sticks on very well. Try and wait a little longer before applying so that it is a tacky consistency and will bond onto your lash line much easier. I would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down the best lash adhesive out there. I have a big allergy to many adhesives to the point where my eyes will swell shut and this does not do that to me. It keeps the lashes on and doesn’t bother my eyes at all. Applicator is very easy to use as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think my favourite thing about this lash adhesive is that it’s a strong hold, but also easy to remove when it’s time to wash it off. I have had trouble in the past with lashes falling off and also with removing the lash glue from My eyelid. It’s pretty amazing how these two problems disappeared with this lash adhesive.  Happy to recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty good lash glue. Needed to reapply in the inner corner cause of my eye shape but overall, pretty good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This glue is super slick and easy to apply on the lashes. They stick really well and hold on the lash line nicely. The only downfall is it can tend to get clumpy, thick after a a few uses. Other than that, it’s great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot LIVE without this lash glue and I've got family members using it too. The glue sticks all day and it lasts when you sweat or workout. I tried to black one, but it wasn't the same as this one. It's easy to take off at the end of the day. If it sticks too much to my eyes, then a little micellar water will do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best lash glue I’ve used. Huda was super sticky and messy, and came out of the tube fast. Tarte melted in the summer and my eyelashes came loose. I love the brush applicator

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this is the first time i’ve used a lash glue and my eyes aren’t irritated or tired at all. i like how it’s not too thick of a formula compared to other glues too. will definitely purchase again :)

reviews.review_title: Does what she needs to do
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A great lash glue and it does last the whole night! However sometimes lasts a lil too long…the glue that caught to my lashes was awful to remove or would rip off my lashes when it would get stuck. Def not the best option for people still learning to use lashes as the black does dry black so you can see it on your lids if you miss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The adhesive works great and is easy to apply... granted that you can get a bottle that isn't already dried up. Out of the 4 times I have tried this product, 3 of them have been completely uselessly dry. So on that note a 3 star rating seems a little too generous, but given that the 1 time I got a bottle that was not dried out, and how well it worked, plus a minimal reaction on sensitive skin, I'd say it was nearly worth rolling the dice here.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the third time this has broken on me. It has completely shattered in my hands while I was opening it. Not being very forceful or anything either, it doesn’t usually take a whole lot for it to open. Sucks that the container is so fragile, especially considering the price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot get overhow easy this lash glue is for my lashes. I get excited when it comes to putting on lashes now! I sweat a lot snd the glue holds the night. Thank you Velour for revolutionizing my makeup process!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite lash glue. It doesn’t take long to get tacky (few sec) and stays on all day. Easy to apply too. Just a bit annoying to remove from lash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve never bought this kind before. Sadly I think something was wrong with it. Mine was all dry and clumpy

reviews.review_title: Check it as soon as you get it.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My absolutely favorite glue, and one of the few I can use because of allergies. Always check it as soon as you purchase, as the product can be compromised (dried out or separated) Sephora customer service a has been fantastic about replacing faulty product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Went to use this today and it literally exploded in my hand when I tried to twist the top off. The last two I bought were already dried up. Might need to start shopping elsewhere for my glue because it’s getting a little ridiculous..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Being a competitive dancer for several years, this is so far my favourite lash glue! I had bought a lash set last year and ran out of the small size it came with. Application is super easy, doesn’t feel heavy on the eyes and lasts all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite eyelash glue. I used to suck at putting on lashes but this glue makes it so easy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lash glue. Stays on all day. If you mess up with the black it just looks like your eyeliner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using velour lash glue for years. It’s always been my favourite it lasts all day. And is super easy to apply or touch up with

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this the first time I started using lashes and loved it.. HOWEVER… the second time I purchased it, the glue was very water and barely held the lashes on my eyes for a few second. There was no stickiness to the lash band. It acted more like a liquid eyeliner. Even applying the glue to my hand, the glue had no stickiness to it. Very disappointment because I would always remember the glue was useless when I was getting ready for the night. Would not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this, but all I am is disappointed. The packaging is nice, but the glue itself is dry, clumpy and barely sticky. It takes about 5 pumps into the bottle to get anything on the brush and doing that trashes the brush. Unfortunately this is a return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The last 6 bottles within 2 weeks have come completely dried up. I’ve contacted Sephora multiple times and been told to take them back and see if the new ones are “to my liking”. I shouldn’t have to keep bringing them back and repurchasing. I usually love this lash glue and it is the only one that doesn’t irritate my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Came in looking like dried cottage cheese, no stickiness and barely any product on the brush. A complete waste of money, shipping and material. Don’t bother purchasing this. Incredibly disappointing. I would give it zero stars if I could.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: O love the white version of this lash glue, but the black version is completely non-sticky, maybe the one I purchased was defective or something. It was basically bad eyeliner. I would just avoid this entirely

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great packaging, brush does not bend.  I love the hard exterior to take with me on the go.  Easy application and easy to remove. The glue however, does not hold.  I always have to reapply half way throughout my day when I'm only wearing concealer.
Did not have good adhesive properties, used as directed and did not adhere the lashes well at all. Applicator wand bristles were very nice and glue went on smoothly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m very pleased how it doesn’t leave hardly residue of my finger and on my eyes!! The glue doesn’t take time to be dried also!! It doesn’t leave a huge harsh, smelly chemical scent!! Nice product!! Really recommend this product and it’s affordable!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE THIS GLUE! Highly recommend! I’ve tried other lash adhesive and nothing compares to this. Dries very fast too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: not a fan. bought this once and the tube was completely dry. bought it again and it wasnt dry but my lashes did not stay on at all. duo lash glue is better and stronger. bought it again (idk why) and it was dry in the tube when i first opened it AGAIN. just not worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Came dried out. Usually a great glue that lasts months

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have always struggled with putting  on false lashes and this product has changed that for me. My new fave.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t usually write reviews unless I absolutely love a product or truly dislike it. And this unfortunately was a hard dislike for me. I’ve been wearing falsies for years now, and I can make most glues work for me. This one just fails me every time. My lashes always pop off from the corners, no matter how much of this I put on the edges. I tried everything, I waited for the glue to get tacky (which only made the adhesion worse), I applied my lashes right after I put the glue, held it on with my tweezer until it dried, and it still came off. I was only able to get about 1 hr of wear time with this glue before I ended up taking off my lashes completely. I really tried to like this glue, but it’s a no from me.

reviews.review_title: super dry inside the tube after the first use.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve owned several of these glues that come with the eyelashes, and I must say that it works good the first time you use it. Like it comes out clean and smooth only for the first time use. It dried up immediately inside when I tried using it the second time the whole tube was dry and it could not be used. They need to reformulate the glue so that it can be useable after the first time use.  Their eyelashes are perfect though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i got a small tube of this with a pair of velour lashes, i loved the glue but when i bought a full size, it was clumpy, and the brush was all messed up. idk if it was just a bad batch or something or something in the ingredients

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LITERALLY MY GO TO LASH GLUE!!! Love everything about it and its so easy to take off my lashes at the end of the day without taking off my natural lashes

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's ok. Takes effort for it to stay on.   Pros:  - really easy to apply - dries really fast Cons: - there's a chance it falling off really easily if not enough glue applied. And even then, there's still a chance.   Overall, don't recommend using for long hours. It's good if you're in a rush cause it dries really fast. I always have to bring this around just incase my lashes falls off

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s not gd for me, can’t hold for a night.if u dun mind only several hr it’s ok

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Used this glue when I went to a fair and was on rides all day (Ring of Fire, Zipper, anything upside down) and it was windy. Lashes didn't budge. This glue means business.

reviews.review_title: Never expected it to be so easy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've struggled with eyelashes my whole life. Every time I want to wear fake eyelashes, I have the hardest time. The glue is too thick, the lashes are too long, they don't fit well on my eyes, the edges come off too quickly, and don't even get me started on magnetic eyelashes (I can't put them on to save my life!). These are a whole different story. I couldn't believe how easy they are! I almost want to wear them everyday now. Love them!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this adhesive, my lashes stay on all day and easy to take off at night!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The black is amazing and blends in with my eyeliner shade which makes any accidental adhesive seem natural! That being said you will have to put more glue on the corners of the lash to get it to stick and you may have to wait an unnecessarily long period of time for it to dry (I personally just put the glue on my lid and put my lash on like that, but to each their own)  If you're a beginner, don't get the black it's super easy to mess up (and if the glue gets on the wrong part of your eye, it's a pain to get off) and look like a swamp monster. If you're a pro, this is a nice transition from eyeliner to lashes imo, love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favourite lash adhesive. Easy to use. Adheres well. The only downside is that the product does tend to build up on the bottle over time (especially around the opening) which can make it annoying to open and close.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Use this on the daily! Has great wear and hold from natural to bold lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Product was all dried up when I opened  it to use it .I thought I had done something wrong only to see other reviews saying the same thing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome glue. Works all day long and easy to clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Good lash adhesive, easy to use and it dries quickly and is clear so it works well with any lashes or eye look. The applicator is easy to use and seems like it will last a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff, it dries quickly and produces a really strong hold! I spent the entire day poolside and in the sun and the sweat from my face didn’t even make it budge wow! It also doesn’t leave you eyes feeling sticky like there is always something on the eyelids I really recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great applicator. I can apply enough lash glue without wasting any extra unnecessary glue. It has a good dry down time for you to apply and make  any slight adjustments you may need.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had the chance to use this as it came with my effortless lash kit. I found that it took longer than usual for it to dry down and stay tacky compared to their other lash glues (to date, their lash and go eyeliner is still my all time fave). However, it did the job so I don't have anything bad to say about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This glue is great. It has strong hold and is easy to apply. It dries clear and is not too thick. I wore lashes with this for the whole day and it held up pretty well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This adhesive is SO easy to apply. It's mess free, it doesn't drip anywhere, and it's precise tip glides right on the lash line. Very happy with this lash adhesive!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use the clear lash glue, and I always recommend it to all my lash Girls! Whether you’re a newbie or a lash queen, this is the glue for you! It goes on blue and dries clear and will stay through pretty much anything...I’ve had complete emotional breakdowns and my lashes have stayed in place!  10/10 will always recommend, and I always DO recommend this lash glue!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the applicator, it’s easy to glide on the lash strips. 1 dip and 1 slide and they’re ready to apply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favourite lash glues, the brush is super thin and precise

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Using this adhesive is very easy. Application and removal are mess-free. The adhesive has strong hold. I also enjoy the minimalistic packaging!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've used many lash adhesives before and this one has the strongest hold! Love the packaging as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Usually I don't use the lash glue that comes with the lashes I purchase but I decided to try this and I found this lash glue does the job!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new go-to. The tackiness lasts long after you've applied it. The applicator makes for easy swiping on your falsies. I used it with the Velour Effortless lashes and it was perfect.  Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: One of my all time favourite lash adhesive for personal and professional use. It has the staying power to keep your lashes in place but I love the flexibility of adjustments when you are applying the lashes on myself or my clients. No irritation and love that it is latex-free.
My ride or die lash glue. I love how tacky it is the min you swipe it on your lash and the staying power is legit 10/10. Cannot recommend this lash glue enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love how easy it is to use the glue. It dries on clear and I don’t have to worry about how it goes on the lashes. It is also very easy to remove. My lashes stayed on the whole time. I would recommend the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a beginner when it is about applying lashes. I hate some glues don’t help who struggle with it. So, I tried velour lashes adhesive. It issss amazing. I can’t express how made my life easier. It is totally clear, no mess afterwards. It holds my lashes without worrying about popping up.   If you struggle with lashes glue, this one is for you.  I am in love with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t have a lot of experience with using lashes, and of the experiences I have I have always struggled with the glue - from the applicator using too much glue to not long lasting. This glue was great. Applied on thin and clear and lasted me the whole day. The brush tip was perfect, allow you to use just enough and quick to dry and stick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lash glue made my lashes stay on all day. I've had a hard time finding lash glue other than the house of lashes glue, and this definitely hit it out of the park with me especially with my oily lids.

reviews.review_title: Best lash glue for on the go and sensitive users!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lash glue. Dries clear and the applicator makes applying and touch ups really easy. Great for on the go and also prefer this so much more than the glue that comes in a tube. Stay power is also pretty good and no stinky glue smell which one popular brand always has that I absolutely hate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this glue over all. The application is precise and it dries down clear. I just wish it was the tiniest bit tackier. I don't have a ton of experience applying lashes and knowing how tacky is tacky enough is not yet my strong suit. I would still recommend this glue and otherwise really like it. I didn't have any irritation or any residue after removing either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved that this was super easy to apply to the lash, took only 30 seconds to be ready to apply and dried so perfectly clear!  No globs of glue at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was very excited to try this glue - got it with the effortless kit. I was so disappointed when I finally opened the package, and the glue was dried out... not a touch of useable glue.. had to go out and buy a different glue to put on the lashes :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like the consistency and there’s no odour (compared to previous brand I used).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favourite lash adhesive. My lashes did not budge for me full day event in the humidity. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Latex free lash adhesive is key for anyone wearing lashes in my opinion. As a makeup artist I always have latex free in my kit as latex is a more common allergy than you would think!! Some latex free lash adhesives just don’t have the same grip as others, this one is perfect!! This keeps your lashes on as long as you need! Attending an emotional wedding? Don’t worry, your lashes will stay put even while you shed a few tears! The best part? When you remove your lashes the adhesive comes off without feeling like you need to be aggressive on your eyelids.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect consistency, has a slight blue tinge that allows you to see exactly where you have glue and then dries clear. Lasts all day, and even survived a workout, not sure if it claims that it’s sweat proof but it certainly didn’t budge for me. The applicator brush is flexible enough to use for touch ups if needed, but probably won’t as this glue won’t budge till you want it to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: To start off, the good. It’s a pretty little tube, so way better than carrying around an unaesthetic tube/having an unappealing product on your vanity. I have three of these adhesives and I just love collecting them. The brush that does the application of the glue glides smoothly and never gets clumpy. Also, there is no need to cover the adhesive after with liner, adding to the natural-look. It’s checking off all the right boxes.   However, I felt the adhesion itself was on the weaker side. If you are wearing really dramatic heavy lashes, I wouldn’t use this glue (I literally did a zoom conference not realizing that my lashes were coming off…). For a natural daily lash, this glue is PERFECT. It’s light & airy. Also, it’s not a pain in the bum to take off my lashes afterwards and my own natural eyelashes aren’t mutilated. I personally preferred Velour’s black eyeliner/adhesive 2-in-1 for a dramatic look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This adhesive is absolutely amazing. I have used it to apply lashes multiple times and they have stayed in place for hours and not difficult to remove. The application on the lash should be fairly opaque and it's best to make sure the ends are saturated to prevent lifting. This is my go-to lash glue!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this glue! I have highly sensitive eyes and most glue and lashes irritate my eyes if worn for over 3 hours.  This glue let's me wear lashes for 12+ hours with my eyes feeling great.  Dries completely clear too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Finally a lash adhesive that is actually clear when it dries. Stays put all day and really easy to use (i am newer to using lash glue and i have really enjoyed using this as the applicator is very easy and doesn’t budge) Great product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This glue is probably one of the best I've ever tried! the glue stayed intact for several hours and lasted through smoke, tears, and anything else you could probably imagine!  I found the Application was very easy in comparison to other glues. The glue dries quickly and is completely clear which is a huge bonus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Enjoyed the lash adhesive fully. Goes on clear and cannot be seen once it is dry. It does start to dry out with time so use appropriately!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The velour lash adhesive is one of the best lash glues I have ever tried. The applicator allows for a very smooth and clean application. I have very sensitive eyes and wear contact lenses and I never had an issue with my eyes not liking the glue. The glue really makes lash application easier and helps those who do not wear eyelashes very often.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The adhesive goes on white, but dries completely clear. It dries quickly and my eyes weren’t irritated by it at all. After about 5 hours of wear I noticed some lifting of the inner corners of my lashes, but nothing major.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

I have sensitive skin on my eyes and this glue hasnt given me a reaction since day 1. 2. The brush is pointed and precise for easy application. 3. It works, I mean it doesn't budge all day in hot humid weather, night out at the club, crying at the movies loool.  The product speaks for itself honestly, and Sephora is always out of stock online so you know people are repurchasing for a reason.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am also on the hunt for new lash adhesive because I am very specific about what I want in my glue. This checked off a few boxes right off the bat. A hard exterior is mandatory so it doesn’t explode all over my products in my makeup bag as well as minimal to no scent detectable when applying to lashes. Finally, this glue has a wonderful thin and tapered brush too which made precise application a breeze.   However, when it came to actual adhesion this glue fell short. On clean, lightly powdered eyelids with no makeup applied, the glue hd a very weak hold and my inner corners would not stick no matter how long I held them down with my lash tweezers. In the end I had to apply a double coat of the glue with one initial layer and a second when the first was getting tacky as well as notably, a giant gob in my inner corners.   Unsure if due to hooded eyes but this glue was just alright. I will of course continue to use it due to the fact that it has no off putting scent like some other brands do and as a small plus, it has the prettiest blue iridescence to it!

reviews.review_title: Before you make up your mind read this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Had to weigh in after reading all the bad reviews..  I’m a lash a-holic. I have a stick pile of almost every velour lash style along with other brands. I’m no newbie. I’ve used Duo lash glue, KISS, Sephora and others. To be honest, I’m impressed with how this glue performs. For a black glue it’s not too wet after you apply it to the lash and let it dry a bit (get tacky) before you place the lash on. But I think where the bad reviews come from is because people are just quickly brushing a thin line on the lash band when in fact you should “dab” it on several times to adequately coat the band then let the air dry it slightly for several seconds before applying. You’ll get a strong air tight seal that will last until you soak it off with a Q-tip or the velour remover. If you just quickly brush on the glue it’s hardly enough to create a seal on your lash lid base. For sure it will come off. Before I became a lash pro, stuff like this would happen to me. Also, some shy away from using the black because they are afraid of smudging the black glue when putting on the lash but this is because it’s too wet and you’re applying it too soon so it “slips” around therefore smudging the black glue everywhere. I find this one does dry down pretty quick compared to say the Kiss latex tube (without a brush) -latex takes longer to dry. Once I apply the lash with the Velour black glue, I can’t pull my lashes off at all. Totally stuck. Another great thing about using this black glue is the lashes blend in so seamlessly whereas with white or neon blue glue you get a dull grey cast at the base that shows you’re obviously wearing false lashes and it looks dirty too. So many times I’ve seen girls (like a server) or someone I don’t know, wearing the white glue and it looking so obvious and messy under lights. With black, or this jet black, you look liner polished as if you’re not wearing any glue. Although if my lash band is very thin, I will use a white glue for the no makeup look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nothing against the negative reviews, but I think some of y'all are confusing user error with product effectiveness. I'm a rookie in the falsies department and always got lash extensions instead because I'd rather cry than try to apply falsies. On a whim, I picked up some velour lashes and the black glue and I haven't had a single issue, in fact they've gone on like a dream. I apply a thick amount on the ends and thin in the middle, wait 30 seconds (every single time 30sec has been PERFECT wait time), and apply. It gives enough time to make adjustments before it completely adheres. Once applied, I push the lashes against my lid gently for 10sec to make sure they're secure. Badda bing, badda boom, they're good to go. This product is great, application is easy with the brush and it stays put all day, and accidentally through a few workouts when I forgot I had lashes on. If you're having issues, I'm calling you out on not following proper application instructions.

reviews.review_text: I loved this product! I don’t wear a ton of falsies so my adhesive experience is pretty limited. reviews.review_text: This little glue bottle is so nifty! The applicator brush makes it really easy to apply on the lashes and to store so that it doesn’t open or spill anywhere. It’s a nice lash glue but there are other options available that would probably work out better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Y’ALL NEED THIS LASH GLUE!!! I couldn’t believe how well this lash glue applied and stay stuck ALL. DAY. LONG. reviews.review_text: Okayyyyy!!! The stickiness can be seen as both a blessing and a curse in a sense. The only real down side to this glue was the amount you get, I apply lashes more than the average person so I ran out of glue quite fast, but if you’re not a person that applies lashes everyday you should be fine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in my fall VoxBox and I loved the adhesive better than the lashes TBH. It was easy to apply with the applicator and the formula provided a strong hold. I accidentally rubbed my eye with the lashes on and it did not ruin it! Overall, I would recommend this to anyone who’s looking for a great alternative lash glue that will get the job done and last a whole day of wear (I used it to apply the velour lashes for a fun filled day at an amusement park, I sweated and it was windy and the lashes still looked perfect because it stuck in its spot).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was using for the first time eye lashes so first time with glue as well. I find it easy to apply with the applicator, probably with a different kind would have been a mess. I put the glue on the eye lashes and then to the eye, and I think I succeed. It lasted for a lot of hours, it felt light and looked good. The good thing is that you take it off and can use again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this glue! You don’t have to wait for it to get tacky before applying the lash to your lash line, you can just put the glue on the lashes and put them on right away. It also holds up pretty well, and it doesn’t have latex, thus being great for people with a latex allergy. The brush on the velour glue makes it superior to duo lash glue, although duo is cheaper in price. Duo’s glue lacks a brush, thus the amount of glue that comes out of the tube when applying it to the lash is hard to control, the brush makes the application of glue to the lashes go seamlessly. This product is the best lash glue I’ve come across, and I love that it’s white but dries clear. Velour hasn’t disappointed me yet! I also received this complimentary from Influenster to test!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this glue however, it’s not as good as I thought it would be. The glue does not take very long to dry, which is great, but my lashes started to fall off my lash lines after two hours. I haven’t had that happen with any of the lash glue I currently use. The applicator is also really great because of the brush that it has but the glue formula definitely needs improvement.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

I heard the glue waa supposes to take a few seconds before it turned blue which is when you then put it on your lid but it was ready as soon as i applied it.  I did love the brush to apply it right where i needed. My right eye would not stop leaking all night long.  I eventually had to remove the lashes while i was out and my eye was beyond raw underneath, which makes no sense honestly. But i think i am just not a fan and lashes arent meant for me and in the end was very glad i got to try these for free.

It was extremely easy to apply with it's precise tip, and more of a paint like application, than the sticky mess I was using before. It almost appeared to glow where applied making it easy to see if I missed a spot. As with any lash glue, you let it sit for a good few seconds before attempting to apply. I found it to dry clear and last throughout the night. I'm impressed.

reviews.review_text: I bought this glue when you could only buy velour products from their actual website. I loooooved that glue. It would dry so quick
Save your money please . I know how to apply lashes but I can never get them to stick with this adhesive. Doesn’t work for more then 5 seconds.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved this glue because it does not make my eyes cry when I stick the eyelashes and apart it dries super fast and it is very easy to remove from the eyelashes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The House of Lashes glue has literally never let me down. I only purchased this one because my local Sephora was out of the HoL glue for a long time. Not trying to be shady but this Velour Lash glue was hands down the worst eyelash glue I’ve ever used. I’d prefer the fishy smell of Duo over this glue. It wasn’t even close to sticky. If I let it dry down at all, I couldn’t stick them on my eyes bc they’d just fall off. So I’d have to sit through the discomfort of sticking them on my eyes when they’re still wet. At the end of the day they came off so easily that I could feel the parts of my eyes that they had never even stuck to. Please do not buy this. Velour, please fix your formula. I’ll stick to my HoL glue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was desperately trying to find a replacement for the house of lashes glue and was skeptical about this because the rose lash glue from velour was awful. Happy to say that my desperation for a new lash glue paid off and this is becoming my holy grail! No fragrance (bless), super thin brush that keeps everything clean, and my lashes stayed on all day (my lashes often lift in the outer corner). Cried a couple of times and my lashes were still on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my go-to lash glue! It is not too thick, so you don’t end up with too much on your lash line. The glue applies with an iridescent colour which makes it easy to see where it’s already been applied. My lashes stay on practically all day with this glue! It’s my new favourite!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: so this lash glue is amazing, dries at the perfect speed, not too slow or fast.  the only reason why im not giving it a 5 is because the glue itself tends to clump onto the edges of the opening so after a while it gets hard to use.  it also feels like you’re wasting a lot of product because it gets stuck, and this lash glue isnt cheap compared to other ones.  but other than that, the actual glue works wonders at applying any type of lashes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: finally a lash glue that keeps my lashes on!!! i have such a hard time w my lashes staying on because my eyes are constantly watering. i've been using this now for a couple weeks, first time for 5 hours, second for 9 and yesterday for 12 HOURS and stayed on ALL DAY. i'm so in love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this glue because I heard it was supposed to be really good, but I was highly disappointed. I had to apply the glue multiple times in order for it to stick, and even then it did not stick for very long. The packaging is super cute, but the product itself is very disappointing. I can't continue using the one I bought, and I will not be buying it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly my lashes fell off twice! I’m disappointed in this lash glue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: as a constant huge falsie wearer this glue is amazing! my lashes never lift after theyre glued down!

reviews.review_title: Dried and clumpy in the bottle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! Definitely recommend this for anyone tryna rock falsies!

reviews.review_title: Not even close to holding up for a day’s work!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I normally use House of Lashes, but they’ve been out of stock for some time. This brand was recommended by a Sephora employee. What a disappointment!  Did not hold up to even half a day at work. I don’t recommend this glue. I can’t remember even imagine what would happen if you cried while using this. Don’t do it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This irritated my eyes like nothing else. On top of that- my lashes wouldn’t even stay on. Within 20 minutes they were falling off which is a problem I’ve never had with a different lash glue. Will unfortunately be returning.

reviews.review_title: works great when they send me one not dried out.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i absolutely adore this glue it works amazing. the only reason i gave it 3 stars is because out of the 2 times ive ordered it online, i have received 3 that are completly dried out. im waiting for sephora to send me a third this order because the last 2 were dried out. its getting ridiculous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t know what this doesn’t have 5 stars all around! I’m loathe applying lashes. The fact that I’m not THE ABSOLUTE BEST at it prob play a part. This particular color dries translucent. Which is a plus for me when I mess up. It’s the perfect type of tacky and it adheres the lash very well!!! Oh. This is my third time buying this. I haven’t bought any other brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not as great as I anticipated given the price! This product is generally great however the biggest done fall is how clumpy it can get. A little goes a long way, therefore only apply a small amount. Otherwise your lash line will basically get sticky for a while. Nonetheless, with thorough cleansing it gets off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best lash glue I’ve come across in a long time!!! There is literally no way time you put the glue on the lashes and stick it right to your eye. Amazing hold, lasts all day long. BEST PART I don’t get that clumpy residue when I take them off

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eyelash glue so much. It helps my falsies stay on all day, even when it's super windy outside and my eyes are tearing up!   I also like how it doesn't have a scent and it's very easy to tell when it's gotten tacky enough to apply the falsies.   Docking one star because it's really tough to remove from my lids, the glue remains for a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great lash glue. The black is a beautiful black that dries just as nice. Pretty solid adhesive that holds all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best glue I have tried. Goes on clear and clean, comes off with the lashes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thought it wouldn’t make a difference to buy a more « high end » false eyelash glue, BUT IT DOES ACTUALLY MAKE A DIFFERENCE (well, at least for me it did). I noticed a better hold of the lash, and the glue dries really quickly. The applicator work well too! Great quality, for a price that’s more than reasonable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had tried this lash glue before they changed the formula needless to say I loved it! I bought one excited to see what it was like and the whole bottle was dry. I am absolutely livid and will never be buying this product again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My false lashes tend to unstick near both ends as the day goes by, so got this as a quick touch up lash glue. Has become my go to, not just for touch ups but for applying lashes as a whole, as it sticks really well for me and since it’s black, have also used it for eyeliner in emergencies (lol). If you’re not that good at putting lashes on (like me) might be a little messy since it is black glue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: By far this is my favorite eyelash adhesive. What I loved initially was no odor. It is completely odorless which helps also if you have sensitive eyes like me. Stays in place for however long you leave it. Grapeseed oil works very well to remove lashes and any residual stickiness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Horrible! Had to re-apply a few times within a span of 5 hrs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to apply. Love the applicator brush. Easy to use and easy to remove.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was recommended this by a friend who swears up and down it’s the best glue a girl can have; but when I got mine and opened it for the first time it was already dried out! The glue was literally stuck on the applicator in chunks. She says it’s not usual for the company but I was definitely disappointed, not planning to try my luck with this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The best glue I’ve tried so far! I recommend it to everyone. Love the brush applicator and how easy it is to control the amount of product I use. Dries nice and quick, and peels off easily at the end of the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like that this is black so it sorta just looks like eyeliner but you’ve gotta be really specific to not make a mess with this guy. The stuff usually gets on the eyelashes and the ends of the eyelashes never stick properly so you have to re apply a couple times. It’s a hassle but I’m astonished at how well this stuff stays on. It’s also super easy to take off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this glue! Love this brand. Unfortunately, when my eyelashes get wet from the rain, or maybe a few tears from laughing too hard, the inside corners of my lashes start to come up a bit. This has happened a few times now. Perhaps I could try using more glue? Otherwise this glue is great. My eyes are sensitive and the latex free formula is great for that! I also recommended to a friend when she started using strip lashes rather than extensions and she loves it as well. 4 stars only because of my ends coming up when wet.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i absolutely love this lash glue. it held my lashes in place all day long from 9am to around 11pm. its amazing and the little brush is so convenient. all around a great product, 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This glue is now my holy grail of lash glues. I put my lashes on and them b*tches don’t come off for ANYTHING. I went to a trampoline park jumped fell down and cried laughing for an hour straight and my lashes didn’t budge. Then I went to talk my guy where we decided to end things and I cried for 20 minutes straight full water works and them b*tches STILL had to be removed when I got home!! THE BEST LASH GLUE i’ve ever tried!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like the brush applicator a lot for this, and the glue isn’t too runny or too viscous so it’s not messy to apply, only a small amount of glue comes out on the brush. It’s really easy to apply in a really thin line and it dried completely clear for me and kept my lashes on all night, no lifting at the corners or anything.

reviews.review_title: DOES NOT KEEP MY LASHES ON
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am not sure if I got a dud but this is the worst lash glue I have ever tried. I constantly have to reapply the glue on the lashes and stick them back on. This shouldn't be happening!! I don't know if you have to use their lashes in order for this to work, but in any case I shouldn't have to constantly reapply the glue on my lashes. Sorry returned!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this glue! I tried it for the very first time and my lashes stayed on all day. I also loved the fact that this glue really dried well and I didn’t see any of the glue on my lids at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: At first I thought I didn’t know what I was doing, but it’s the glue! No matter how long I wait (6 min max I guess) it doesn’t get tacky, and my lashes lift at the corners.  Worthless.

reviews.review_title: Just as good as their lashes!!!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best lash glue! I love the applicator, it makes it really easy to apple the glue precisely without the mess. Don’t let me start on the packaging (luxury) I get it mixed up with my Dior show mascara. Beautiful matte black finish. Best of all it drys super fast but still gives you enough time to adjust lash before it drys.

reviews.review_title: DRIED OUT!! DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If I could give this review lower than 1 star I would. This is my very first review & I’ve been a Sephora member for many years. I only return things a couple times, I usually will order a product even if I don’t like it the first time trying it I will keep it bc later on I end up liking it, it could use it in other ways it give it away. That being said I HATE returning things. Well, I’m so disappointed with this lash glue I had to write a review to tell you guys DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY! I received the Velour lash glue in a sample tube a few months ago & fell in love with it. It outperformed my house of lashes, duo & Sephora brand. That’s why I decided to order this one. Well, this one came all dried up in the bottle. At first I thought I recurved a bad batch, well Sephora sent out another one & the same thing happened. It’s not usable at all. I mean $12 isn’t a lot of money but I ran out of all my lash glue & it was just disappointing. I won’t be buying from this brand again. Don’t waste your money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this glue because I was told that the glue I was looking for, House of Lashes, was being discontinued. Sleek cute tube but NOT at all sticky! I had to try three applications and applying my lashes took me twice as long as it should have! My old dried up bottle of House of Lashes glue is better than a new tube of this stuff. Love Velour lashes but this glue is a no. I heard that the clear version is the same quality as House of Lashes but not willing to take that gamble. THANK YOU NEXT!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first lash adhesive that I have purchased that doesn’t make my eyes itch like crazy, even after a long day of wear. It dries clear, very fast, and lasts for a long time (~12 hours). It also comes off with ease on skin and the lashes themselves. I don’t think I want to buy a drugstore brand ever again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: New favorite lash glue! Keeps my lashes on all day even if I get water on them. Dries super fast too so i don’t have to be waiting long to put my lashes on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wouldn’t dry and wouldn’t stick to my lash line:

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this lash glue on numerous occasions and I've wanted to like it bc I remember loving their older formula. This new formula just doesn't work for me. My lashes lift every single time I use this glue. When I take off my lashes, it is super gentle but that also tells me the adhesive power is really weak.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it. Recommend!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is possibly the strangest lash glue I’ve tried. It takes FOREVER to get tacky/sticky. Once it’s dried it’s not gonna come up for the entire day which is awesome, but getting to that point is hard. Also, I have the hardest time trying to get the glue OFF! It ripped out some of my natural lashes and I couldn’t get it off of some parts of my eyelids for a couple days no matter what I tried... which freaks me out because I’m scared of eye infections and stuff. I like the duo one better and it’s much cheaper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My false eyelashes stayed on beautifully all night long!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

With that being said, it's great for tricky spots such as the inner corner of your eyes - your lashes won't move.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i usually never write reviews but my experience with this product was just too good.. this stuff lasted 12+ hours, through a good cry sesh in the morning AND skydiving?!?! granted i wore protective glasses sharing the jump but still... my old lash glue would have failed before i even left the house. anyways 10/10 recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this with velour eyelashes and an applicator in a kit and have been using it for about a month for the workweek and it is the best kind I've used so far. I've also tried Duo which is messy and Kiss which doesn't stick for near as long. this has literally lasted me 10-12 hrs during my long work shifts and I do get oily eyelids at the end of a long day. definitely recommend. haven't tried the black yet because most of the time I go for a more natural look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used ALOT of different eyelash glues since I'm a huge fan of falsies. However, my eyelids are sensitive and often would have an allergic reaction where they would get red, swell, or even worse to a point it was oozing. Duo was the worst brand but Ardell, Kiss, and Tarte lash glues haven't helped me either. I've either had my lashes falling off in the corners or my eyelids irritated when I took the lashes off. Velour Lash glue has been a perfect combo of hold and comfort!! Strong hold even when sweating to death while running :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not that great it doesn’t stay long much... very disappointing of this product. Doesn’t hold the lashes very much

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent lash glue!  This lash glue is wonderful for people who like to reuse their lashes frequently.  It leaves a sticky but easy to remove residue and doesn't destroy your lashes like so many other brands.  I also love that it stays tacky so if you need to correct the placement you can!  By far my fave!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I need to return it. It was one of the worst glues  Iv ever used the free glue that comes with some lashes is better. It would not stick it peeled of in a strip and would not hold the lashes in place at all I was so disappointed I had a special event to attend and purchased this along with a new pair of lashes and was sadly disappointed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked using this eyelash glue. It was a like a good combination between duo and houseoflashes glue! I went snorkeling using this glue and ardell lashes, although I was wearing goggles water still seeped in, I was amazed that my lashes stayed on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the packaging and the applicator (I find squeeze tubes too messy), but unfortunately the glue does NOT hold. I’ve never had this issue with previous lash adhesives which is a shame, because this wasn’t exactly the cheapest!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had to look for an alternate lash glue as I developed an allergy to the DUO lash glue (blue packaging) after using it for almost 10 years. I would probably recommend the clear colour over the black. Also due to the packaging, the glue dries out really fast. I've only had mine for a couple of months and I can tell the formula is already thickening and applies less smoothly. For the price, I would not recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: Best Glue I've Tried So Far
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I really like the Velour lash glue – I like that the applicator comes with a tiny brush that helps you distribute the lash glue in a perfectly even line – it’s impossible to apply too much glue or to get a glob of glue on the strip with the way this glue is designed… The design pulls the perfect amount of product on the small brush every time, never too much or too little. As you can kind of see from the picture I’ve posted the lash glue itself is clear with a kind of iridescent shimmer to it that helps you see where you applying the product on the strip – it dries clear but has a iridescent quality as you’re applying it and I found this extremely useful because I could see how much I covered. The glue felt light but at the same time it kept the lashes perfectly in place for 8 hours until I removed the lashes myself. I think this is a really good glue for everyone, including people who are not as well versed in lash application, because it doesn’t come out as “liquid” as some other glues. In lash application it is crucial to let the glue dry for 30 seconds – 60 seconds before applying the lash to your eye because with more watery formulas the lash will slip and slide everywhere if the glue has not yet dried to a nice tacky sticky consistency. With this lash glue I find the error margin is much smaller – I would still wait 30 – 45 seconds before applying it but I tried it after only 15-20 seconds and there were no problems. This glue is what I would call “more forgiving” lol. Will definitely repurchase because it's the best lash glue I have tried so far!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: I love the look of false eyelashes but hate the messy application with traditional lash adhesive. I love the ease of applying lashes with this easy-to-use lash adhesive. Thanks for changing my life!
I love it it sticks to my lid all day even in gym class!
